document_name: Enhancing Justice Delivery Annual Work Plan 2012
Capacity Building for Justice Law and Order

outputs.output_descr:
1.	Strengthened co-ordination framework of the Justice, Law and Order Sector (JLOS),
2.	Policies and law reforms formulated in line with existing reforms, international obligations and the  Constitution 
3.	Strengthened capacity of the justice, law and order sector institutions to effectively and efficiently execute their mandates 
4.	Enhanced legal aid mechanisms 
5.	Enhanced engagement in state party reporting, Universal Periodic Review (UPR) and follow up of recommendations in a participatory and consultative manner 
6.	Capacity of the State to comply with international human rights obligations strengthened
7.	Regional and international human rights instruments ratified and domesticated;
8.	Increased knowledge, understanding and application of rights based approaches

project_descr: Capacity building for the Justice Law and Order sector to strengthen the human rights, democracy and enhance peoples participation.
project_title: Capacity building for justice Law and Order
